title: Nutrition: fueling the human machine
creator_credit: BFA Educational Media and Columbia Broadcasting System
brief_description: Enumerates the facts of nutrition that affect our physical health and well-being. Encourages a balanced and varied diet, discusses the possible dangers of food additives and sugar, and emphasises the importance of exercise to avoid obesity. Suitable for middle and upper secondary levels.
